title: Insurance Agent - Entry Level
description_text:
General Information
Location:
South Carolina, Greer
Description & Requirements
Entry Level - Health & Life Insurance Associate
We’re seeking motivated, driven individuals who are eager to launch a rewarding career in the insurance industry. As an
AmeriLife Health & Life Insurance Agent
, you’ll play a critical role in helping clients protect what matters most—while building a lucrative, long-term career with unlimited growth potential.
At AmeriLife, you won’t be limited to just one carrier. Our agents represent
50+ top-rated insurance companies
, giving you the flexibility and product breadth to truly serve your clients’ needs with confidence and integrity.
What You’ll Do
Deliver exceptional customer experiences by educating and guiding clients through informed insurance decisions
Conduct personalized needs assessments to identify appropriate life, health, and retirement solutions
Build and maintain strong relationships with both new and existing clients
Use provided and proven sales tools, marketing resources, and leads to grow your book of business
Operate with professionalism, integrity, and a client-first mindset
What We’re Looking For
Self-motivated individuals with a strong desire to succeed
Entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for personal growth
A genuine interest in helping others plan for their future
Valid driver’s license and reliable transportation
No prior insurance experience required—we provide training
What We Offer
Comprehensive Training & Development
Online coursework, classroom instruction, and hands-on field training to set you up for success
Robust Leads Program
Access to direct mail campaigns, seminars and workshops, digital and media leads, and more
High Earning Potential
Industry-leading commissions, advanced commissions on many products, weekly pay, and NEW daily pay on select products—no income caps
Career Advancement Opportunities
Clear paths for growth with a strong promote-from-within culture
Top-Tier Tools & Support
AmeriLife-provided iPad with full access to proprietary sales tools
Professional, custom-designed marketing materials
Dedicated and responsive home office sales support
Licensing Support
Assistance with pre-licensing, fingerprinting, and state insurance exams for qualified candidates
If you’re ready to build a meaningful career with flexibility, earning potential, and long-term stability—and want to become a trusted agent in the insurance industry—
we’d love to hear from you. Apply today and take the first step toward your future with AmeriLife.
Apply

, you’ll play a critical role in helping clients protect what matters most—while building a lucrative, long-term career with unlimited growth potential.
At AmeriLife, you won’t be limited to just one carrier. Our agents represent
50+ top-rated insurance companies
, giving you the flexibility and product breadth to truly serve your clients’ needs with confidence and integrity.
What You’ll Do
Deliver exceptional customer experiences by educating and guiding clients through informed insurance decisions
Conduct personalized needs assessments to identify appropriate life, health, and retirement solutions
Build and maintain strong relationships with both new and existing clients
Use provided and proven sales tools, marketing resources, and leads to grow your book of business
Operate with professionalism, integrity, and a client-first mindset
What We’re Looking For
Self-motivated individuals with a strong desire to succeed
Entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for personal growth
A genuine interest in helping others plan for their future
Valid driver’s license and reliable transportation
No prior insurance experience required—we provide training
What We Offer
Comprehensive Training & Development
Online coursework, classroom instruction, and hands-on field training to set you up for success
Robust Leads Program
Access to direct mail campaigns, seminars and workshops, digital and media leads, and more
High Earning Potential
Industry-leading commissions, advanced commissions on many products, weekly pay, and NEW daily pay on select products—no income caps
Career Advancement Opportunities
Clear paths for growth with a strong promote-from-within culture
Top-Tier Tools & Support
AmeriLife-provided iPad with full access to proprietary sales tools
Professional, custom-designed marketing materials
Dedicated and responsive home office sales support
Licensing Support
Assistance with pre-licensing, fingerprinting, and state insurance exams for qualified candidates
If you’re ready to build a meaningful career with flexibility, earning potential, and long-term stability—and want to become a trusted agent in the insurance industry—
we’d love to hear from you. Apply today and take the first step toward your future with AmeriLife.
Apply
